data.name: English Standard Version
data.description: The English Standard Version (ESV) is an English translation of the Christian Bible. It is a revision of the 1971 edition of the Revised Standard Version. The translators' stated purpose was to follow an \\\"essentially literal\\\" translation philosophy.
data.vdescription: The English Standard Version (ESV) is an English translation of the Christian Bible. It is a revision of the 1971 edition of the Revised Standard Version. The translators' stated purpose was to follow an \\\"essentially literal\\\" translation philosophy.

translations.name: Crossway
translations.description_short: Crossway is a non-profit Christian ministry that proclaims the gospel through publishing translations of the Bible like the ESV.
